text: @ScrambledAdams I mean, of course there's a lot of funny people about.

passages.full_quote: <used>I mean, of course there's</used> female dwarfs but... I mean, they have the decency not to show it.

passages.fragment: of course there 's a lot of
passages.full_quote: I'm sure there's a lot of dwarfs in the city that'd flock there if they knew about it, and <used>of course there's a lot of</used> youngsters that ought to learn more about their proud heritage

passages.fragment: 's a lot of funny people about .
passages.full_quote: There'<used>s a lot of funny people about</used>.
